::Battera::

She smiled. She was overjoyed that he would stay with her.
She gently squeezed his hand. "Thank you" was all she could whisper 
to him.
She turned to Vulois, "Now what?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     "What a difficult choice, stay here with Battera, or go back to 
Magmatron 
> and get slagged," CyberShark said. "I'll be staying here."
